comments.body: Somehow the copyright notice is not formatted as it should be.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
limitations under the License.
*/

comments.body: Any particular reason this is pointer, if we're defaulting it to `true` ?
Do we need it to be pointer? We can always check `Changed` value to see if it was set, but for majority of cases this only complicates the code.

> Do we need it to be pointer? We can always check Changed value to see if it was set, but for majority of cases this only complicates the code.

Once you compose the values, you can no longer guarantee you were set by cobra and no code after the binding should ever assume it has access to the flagset.
It's preferred to use `ok` for the 2nd parameter when checking if element exists in the map.
